IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM [WebApi].[User] WHERE [Id]=#Id#) UPDATE [WebApi].[User] SET [Account]=#Account#,
[Password]=#Password#,
[Description]=#Description#, [Status]=#Status#, [ModifyUserId]=#ModifyUserId#, [ModifyDateTime]=GETDATE() WHERE [Id]=#Id# ELSE INSERT INTO [WebApi].[User] ( [Account], [Password], [Description], [Status], [CreateUserId], [CreateDateTime] ) VALUES ( #Account#, #Password#, #Description#, #Status#, #CreateUserId#, GETDATE() )
statements.delete: DELETE FROM [WebApi].[User] WHERE [Id]=#value#; DELETE FROM [WebApi].[UserRole] WHERE [UserId]=#value#;
statements.select: SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [Account] AS Account, [Password] AS Password, [Description] AS Description, [Status] AS Status, [CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, [CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, [ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, [ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [WebApi].[User] WHERE [Id]=#value#

SELECT TOP 1 [Id] AS Id, [Account] AS Account, [Password] AS Password, [Description] AS Description, [Status] AS Status, [CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, [CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, [ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, [ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [WebApi].[User] WHERE [Account]=#value#
SELECT Id, Account, Password, Status FROM WebApi.[User] WHERE Account=#Account# AND [Password]=#Password#

WITH CTE AS( SELECT [Id] AS Id, [Account] AS Account, [Password] AS Password, [Description] AS Description, [Status] AS Status, [CreateUserId] AS CreateUserId, [CreateDateTime] AS CreateDateTime, [ModifyUserId] AS ModifyUserId, [ModifyDateTime] AS ModifyDateTime FROM [WebApi].[User]
), PAGING AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY [Id] DESC) AS RowIndex, CTE.* FROM CTE ) SELECT * FROM PAGING WHERE RowIndex BETWEEN (#PageIndex#-1)*#PageSize#+1 AND #PageIndex#*#PageSize#
